Verses: 1 dhevane, Neer En Niyaayaththai Visaariththu, Pagdhiyillaadha Jaadhiyaarodu Enakkaaga Vazhakkaadi, Soodhum Aniyaayamumaana Manushanukku Ennaith Thappuviyum.
2 en Aranaagiya Dhevan Neer; En Ennaith Thallividugireer? Saththuruvinaal Odukkappattu, Naan En Dhukkaththudane Thiriyavendum?
3 umadhu Velichchaththaiyum Umadhu Saththiyaththaiyum Anuppiyarulum; Avaigal Ennai Nadaththi, Umadhu Parisuththa Parvadhaththirkum Umadhu Vaasasthalangalukkum Ennaik Kondupovadhaaga.
4 appozhudhu Naan Dhevanudaiya Peedaththandaikkum, Enakku Aanandha Magizhchchiyaayirukkira Dhevanidaththirkum Piravesippen. Dhevane, En Dhevane, Ummaich Suramandalaththaal Thudhippen.
5 en Aaththumaave, Nee En Kalangugiraai? En Enakkul Thiyangugiraai? Dhevanai Nokkik Kaaththiru; En Mugaththirku Ratchippum En Dhevanumaayirukkiravarai Naan Innum Thudhippen.
